tosdr.case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
quoteText: You agree that if Comcast does not exercise or enforce any contractual or legal right or remedy to which it is entitled, this will not be taken to be a formal waiver of Comcast's rights and that those rights or remedies will still be available to Comcast.
